publicwhip.spmotion: S3M-4541 Willie Coffey: Seventh Year of Success for Ayrshire Sportsability Come and Try Eventâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Ayrshire Sportsability on its seventh successful Come and Try event; notes that the 2009 event took place over three days in the Magnum Centre, Irvine and involved nearly 600 primary and secondary pupils with physical and learning disabilities and was supported by NHS Ayrshire and Arran, the three Ayrshire local authorities, North Ayrshire Leisure Ltd, Kilmarnock College and local and national disability sports organisations, and expresses its appreciation of the efforts of all those involved, especially the coaches and volunteers and the staff of the Magnum Centre for contributing to such a positive experience for so many children and young people.

S3M-4541 Seventh Year of Success for Ayrshire Sportsability Come and Try Event (lodged on 30 June 2009) Bob Doris*, Alasdair Allan*, Cathy Jamieson*, Jamie McGrigor*, Gil Paterson*, Christine Grahame*, Aileen Campbell*, Ross Finnie*, Stuart McMillan* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
